channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01KABRHN7YP5GZG58D8EF6XGQC
item.description: @the Found your status because of #Cloudflare, but your username made me re-think: I should have used @the instead.
item.content:encoded: @the Found your status because of #Cloudflare, but your username made me re-think: I should have used @the instead.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01KABR5FPRP9WXHZ0TP6R8M3QN
item.description:
With #CloudflareDown for like 3 hours today, it’s time to re-think my relying too much on #Cloudflare. I’m not using X/Twitter any longer, but here’s how this downtime affected my life today:

  • ChatGPT
  • client.pushover.net
  • Online banking
  • My own domains (and subdomains) that have my DNS record proxied (orange toggle) on Cloudflare
item.content:encoded:
With #CloudflareDown for like 3 hours today, it’s time to re-think my relying too much on #Cloudflare. I’m not using X/Twitter any longer, but here’s how this downtime affected my life today:

  • ChatGPT
  • client.pushover.net
  • Online banking
  • My own domains (and subdomains) that have my DNS record proxied (orange toggle) on Cloudflare

item.title: How to Run Python Scripts and Apps in n8n!
item.description:
How to Run Python Scripts and Apps in n8n!

Unlock the power of Python within your n8n workflows! This tutorial demonstrates how to seamlessly integrate Python scripts and applications into your n8n instance. Learn how to run Python code directly within n8n, opening up a world of possibilities for automation and data processing.
item.content:encoded:
How to Run Python Scripts and Apps in n8n!

Unlock the power of Python within your n8n workflows! This tutorial demonstrates how to seamlessly integrate Python scripts and applications into your n8n instance. Learn how to run Python code directly within n8n, opening up a world of possibilities for automation and data processing.

item.title: Performance tuning in n8n: Practical wins before you SCALE - LumaDock
item.description:
Performance tuning in n8n: Practical wins before you SCALE - LumaDock

A practical guide to n8n performance tuning on a VPS. Faster workflows, safer scaling, fewer stalls. It’s easy - I promise :)
item.content:encoded:
Performance tuning in n8n: Practical wins before you SCALE - LumaDock

A practical guide to n8n performance tuning on a VPS. Faster workflows, safer scaling, fewer stalls. It’s easy - I promise :)

item.title: 'Breaking' change from Docker v29 (API 1.44 mandatory)
item.description:
'Breaking' change from Docker v29 (API 1.44 mandatory)

The last docker version v29 makes it mandatory to use API version 1.44 or newer. It is not a breaking change per se, but it can break interaction with Traefik and Watchtower for example.
item.content:encoded:
'Breaking' change from Docker v29 (API 1.44 mandatory)

The last docker version v29 makes it mandatory to use API version 1.44 or newer. It is not a breaking change per se, but it can break interaction with Traefik and Watchtower for example.

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3m57h3acfb22g
item.description: I loved Racknerd. But I might just need to let go of some of my services I have hosted with them. I just needed to streamline all my VPS and shared server subscriptions.
item.content:encoded: I loved Racknerd. But I might just need to let go of some of my services I have hosted with them. I just needed to streamline all my VPS and shared server subscriptions.
